data.message: Oh damn! Ive been saying this the whole time.... take the focus to the NFL and twitter to keep people from focusing on the real problems!! <3 Eminem for president lol!!!!!! #Eminemforpresident #keepthatfisthigh #drawthatline............................................... Please notice the "LOL" for the people who think its ok to call people names.

replies.message: He couldn't pass a drug test
Well obviously you need to do some research because he went through rehab and got clean apparently you just want to talk shit because you support trump and didn't like what he had to say about him!
Kerry Holcomb actually he is drug free nowadays. He went through rehab and is clean. Learn of whom you speak before you open your lips.
Wtf does his drug use have to do with his lyrical skills? Not a damn thing
Trump cannot pass a simple human decency test.... Don't forget he has ALOT of dirty laundry too.
Really Toni like what
Thats all it takes to become president?
I'm guessing me saying "lol" was not seen? Anyone can run for president, all the power to them.

Not everyone follows the NFL or Twitter, me being one of those ppl. I don't see that as any more than an excuse. Instead I have followed the important stories, such as where our country needs help from natural disasters and violent attacks i.e. Las Vegas. Eminem is wrong and buying and selling all of you into his agenda of division and hate.
and when I said he say ALOT of dirty laundry it means that he is just like everyone else. He has his demons also...the only thing is money and ego hide them.
Couldn't pass a drug test, yet he's more successful than you'll ever be lol...
That is actually one thing he's 100 percent right on, this idiotic NFL bullshit.
In other words. If you don't have a perspective take mine. All else is flawed.

No one has to like or agree with anything I said. That's ok...I still sleep good at night. My opinion can be very different from others and that's fine. I will never expect everyone to change what they believe and say "Hey YOU! Your so right!!"... like I said my opinion. Some can take it as me being sarcastic, some can take it as serious as can be, some can take it as a joke and that's all fine and dandy in my eyes.
I can see where you would think he'd make a good president considering you voted for Bernie and then Hillary.

5 trillion surplus. Wallstreets stock market at an all time high. Best economic growth in 16 years. ISIS surrendering in Iraq. Yeah the worst president ever. Some of y'all need education and stop focusing on what celebs and CNN tell you to. Sheeppl
Never happen!
Its becouse of people like you that trump is president coz you think becouse yoh like someone you should vote for them
Don't like Trump and didn't vote for him! #jussayin

Kinda like how we're all distracted by statues An kneeling instead of protesting congress for a better life an economy for us ... you don't hear the rich saying to do that cuz they can afford it ... but they'll play along with An gain our money why we think they care ..they are paid to keep us distracting from getting what we want ...

Nothing has been done last 16 years An it's got to the point where trump had to run he speaks what we think An says what needs to be An not being political guide.... if we would of protested congress years ago it wouldn't of gotten this bad ... It's not trump it's congress stop listening to the rich celebs An ect they have a different life but it's funny that people are following what they say or radio show host or news who all are rich An tree life's then us think ppl
